main event: Observers reported seeing two bright lights in North Highlands, California on 27/05/52, which disappeared and reappeared after a few minutes.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 6-8 minutes,The objects were noted to be similar to aircraft landing lights or artificial satellites,The witnesses indicated the objects moved from North to South, but their trajectory contradicted wind patterns at the time,One description compared the objects to hot air balloons, and there was no physical evidence or photographs obtained from the sighting.
sighted object: two bright lights in the sky
witness description: An observer who reported the sighting on their own.
